word_mean: 概率，机率：一特定事件发生的可能性，可看做0和1之间的一个数，相当于在同一条件下一系列独立试验中一个事件发生的长期频率

sentence.Network_en: Formal talks are still said to be a possibility, not a probability.
sentence.Network_cn: 据称正式会谈仍有可能，但可能性不大。

sentence.Network_en: The probability is that prices will rise rapidly.
sentence.Network_cn: 物价有可能会迅速上升。

sentence.Network_en: The probability that it will rain today is high.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天下雨的可能性很大.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin probabilitas, from probabilis 'provable, credible' (see probable)

entry.def: The probability of something happening is how likely it is to happen, sometimes expressed as a fraction or a percentage.

example.ex: Without a transfusion, the victim's probability of dying was 100%...
example.tran: 如果不输血，患者必死无疑。

example.ex: The probabilities of crime or victimization are higher with some situations than with others...
example.tran: 在有些情况下，犯罪或受害的几率要相对更高。

entry.def: You say that there is a probability that something will happen when it is likely to happen.

example.ex: There's an excellent probability that unless action is quickly taken, pipes will freeze...
example.tran: 除非立即采取行动，否则管道很有可能冻住。

example.ex: If you've owned property for several years, the probability is that values have increased...
example.tran: 如果一处房产已经拥有多年，有可能它已经增值了。

entry.def: If you say that something will happen in all probability, you mean that you think it is very likely to happen.

example.ex: The Republicans had better get used to the fact that in all probability, they are going to lose...
example.tran: 共和党人最好习惯他们很有可能失败的事实。

example.ex: In all probability, the final upturn in their fortunes is some months away yet.
example.tran: 很可能再过数月他们才会转运。

means.word_mean: 1. a measure of how likely it is that some event will occur;

sentences.sentence: "we have a good chance of winning"

auth_sentence.content: It all has to do with probability and chance.
auth_sentence.res_content: It all has to do with probability and chance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It all has to do with probability and chance.

auth_sentence.content: There is no certainty in science, only probability.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no certainty in science, only probability.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no certainty in science, only probability.

auth_sentence.content: But mathematics also admits statistics, probability and chaos.
auth_sentence.res_content: But mathematics also admits statistics, probability and chaos.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But mathematics also admits statistics, probability and chaos.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,大概的;有希望的,可能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: prob测试,证明+able能……的→能证明的
prob测试,证明+ative表形容词→adj.检验的
approbate[v.许可,认可,承认]+ion表名词→n.称赞,认可
dis不+approbation[n.称赞,认可]→n.不答应,非难,不赞成
prob测试,证明+ation表名词→测试→试验
prob测试,证明+e→n.探针,探测器 v.[以探针等]探查,穿刺,查究
prob测试,证明+ity表名词→[人]经得起证明和试验
re反+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏[的人]
ap一再+prob证明+ate表动词→一再证明[可行]→批准
prob测试,证明+e→n.探针,探测器 v.[以探针等]探查,穿刺,查究
re反+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏[的人]

means.word_mean: 可能性, 可能发生的事

sentences.en: The probability that it will rain today is high.
sentences.cn: 今天下雨的可能性很大。

sentences.en: He must calculate the probability of failure.
sentences.cn: 他必须计算一下失败的概率。

jushi.english: The probability that it will rain today is high.
jushi.chinese: 今天下雨的可能性很大。

jushi.english: There is a 50% probability that the population will be infected with the disease.
jushi.chinese: 民众感染这种疾病的概率为50%。
